committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To amend the General Education Provisions Act to allow State and county prosecutors access to student records in certain cases.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to declare that nothing in such Act shall be construed to require State and county prosecutors to obtain a court order to receive student information, before or after adjudication, if the information sought pertains to a criminal investigation or prosecution of the student.

titles.title: To amend the General Education Provisions Act to allow State and county prosecutors access to student records in certain cases.
